name: strip-loader
description: Webpack loader to strip arbitrary functions out of your production code.

scripts.cover: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --dir artifacts -- ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha tests/unit/ --recursive --reporter spec
